unnormalised: Yeah, good luck finding my place. I live at "Near the big banyan tree," which apparently isn't on Google Maps yet. The courier guy from DTDC called 5 times! Address on the slip says "Opposite Ganesh Temple, Lane 3, House No. 7/B, Old Goa, Goa, 403402." He was more lost than I am during monsoon season. Maybe I should just start sending GPS coordinates next time: 15.4989° N, 73.8315° E. Then again, knowing my luck, he'd end up in the Arabian Sea.
normalised: yeah, good luck finding my place. I live at "Near the big banyan tree," which apparently isn't on Google Maps yet. The courier guy from D-T-D-C called five times! Address on the slip says "Opposite Ganesh Temple, Lane three, House Number seven slash B, Old Goa, Goa, four zero three four zero two." He was more lost than I am during monsoon season. Maybe I should just start sending G-P-S coordinates next time: fifteen point four nine eight nine degree north, seventy three point eight three one five degree east. Then again, knowing my luck, he'd end up in the Arabian Sea.
